titleStmt.title: Klavermusik for Smaa og Store I & II, opus 53

work.title: Klavermusik for Smaa og Store I & II, opus 53
Piano Music for Young and Old I & II, Opus 53
Klavermusik for små og store I & II

history.p: Nielsen's work on Klavermusik for Smaa og Store is first mentioned in August 1929 when he was engaged with the question of music for teaching purposes. This is also evident from an introductory address that he gave at Musikpædagogisk Forening in December 1929. According to his diary, the last fourteen pieces were composed during January 1930 at a rate of roughly one piece a day.
